name: Best Forklift Operator
description:
⚙️👷 ＳＵＭＭＡＲＹ 👷⚙️

📢 Best Forklift Operator is a unique game about driving a forklift - a vehicle without which world trade would stop. You can experience the challenges of a forklift operator by playing as you like: on a gamepad, with a mouse and keyboard, or by immersing yourself entirely in this world by running the game on VR goggles.

📢 Take the training and show that you are ready for the challenges. Complete tasks fast and precisely, earn money and become the king of warehouses, yards, loading and unloading. Just be careful not to damage your equipment or products, if this happens your wallet will quickly become empty!

📢In the current version of the game (Early Access) - There’s a basic version of career mode in which you earn money by completing missions and enjoying life to the fullest in your forklift. This happens in two warehouses where we undertake a series of challenges.

📢The game features a combination of faithful simulation and entertainment that forklift fans have been waiting for for a long time.

⚙️👷 R O A D M A P 👷⚙️

💬 Best Forklift Operator is a project that will be developed on an ongoing basis.

🔽 Currently we have to offer 🔽
Now you can enjoy a realistic driving model, two warehouses, two forklifts, basic economy, ten missions, two extra missions with randomly generated challenges; experience the whole game also in VR mode, in which all tasks take on an entirely new flavor.

🔽 Here's what we have planned for the following updates: 🔽
👷‍♂️ The third, new, largest warehouse space - connected to the loading yard;
👷‍♂️ New and varied mission modes;
👷‍♂️ Third (largest) forklift;
👷‍♂️ Arcade mode;
👷‍♂️ Native and Steam Leaderboards;
👷‍♂️ Steam Achievements;

We also count on the votes of the community, as we want to develop this game along with what you expect from it!
